Description:
Detects installation of new certificate on the system which attackers may use to avoid warnings when connecting to controlled web servers or C2s

Author: Ömer Günal, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Install Root Certificate
Query: sourcetype like 'linux-%' eql select * from _source_ where (process_path like '%/update-ca-certificates' or process_path like '%/update-ca-trust')
